name: Pers Timer
description:
For every 1 card you draw: This card will gain 1 Pressure Level.
When the attached character uses Pressurized Floe: If Pressure Level is at least 2, cancel this effect, and the Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die. If, after the Skill is finalized, the Pressure Level is at least 4, deal 2 additional Physical DMG.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>For every 1 card you draw:</color> This card will gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Pressure Level</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the attached character uses $[S11122]:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Pressure Level</color> is at least 2, cancel this effect, and the Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die. If, after the Skill is finalized, the Pressure Level is at least 4, deal 2 additional $[K100].
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>For every 1 card you draw:</color> This card will gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Pressure Level</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the attached character uses Pressurized Floe:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Pressure Level</color> is at least 2, cancel this effect, and the Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die. If, after the Skill is finalized, the Pressure Level is at least 4, deal 2 additional {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>.
